2. 
In this 15 airports, secondary security check t the ladder point shall be 
resorted to by the concerned airlines as and when directed by the BCAS under 
the following situations 
 
 
(i) 
at the time of high alerts; 
(ii) for operational requirements; 
(iii) in order to determine efficiency of the security  staff.      
 
3. 
Random secondary security check  shall be conducted by  all airlines through 
their trained and certified security personnel under intimation to this Bureau.. 
 
4. 
The above instructions shall be implemented by all concerned airline operators 
with immediate effect.
